name: Documentation Research Memory Workflow
description: Standardized process for reviewing core documentation, generating knowledge memories, and tracking follow-up workflows for implementation.

triggers.description: Run every Monday at 09:00 to refresh research notes.
Invoke when new documentation or architecture updates land.

prerequisites: Access to any new documentation that needs integration

details.notes: Add any new docs or ADRs published since last run.

rules: Create or update an existing memory if insights already exist
One memory per major document or change set
Summaries must include file references and intended usage

criteria: At least 3 active memories exist covering architecture, design, and implementation guidance
New documentation introduces net-new integration tasks
details.onNotSatisfied: Log TODO and schedule follow-up research session

actions: Draft workflow focused on applying insights to React feature folders (e.g., src/features/dashboard)
Include tasks to update components/pages with MD3 system and typed hooks (useDashboardData)
Document dependency checks (e.g., @tanstack/react-query alignment) before implementation
Create memory reminding future runs to reuse this workflow

outputs.memories: Updated Cascade memories containing the latest documentation insights
outputs.followUpWorkflow: New or updated implementation workflow when coverage criteria satisfied
outputs.auditLog: Timestamped summary of documentation reviewed and actions taken
